sentence.Network_en: Recline & Sprawl is an amusingly named furniture shop in London.
sentence.Network_cn: Recline&Sprawl是伦敦一家店名有趣的家具店。
必须要把它写得趣味盎然。

sentence.Network_en: The play was amusingly written, but its subject was a serious one.
sentence.Network_cn: 剧本写得风趣逗笑, 但其主题则是严肃的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(A) ... amusing 有趣的 amusingly 有趣地 amusive 有趣的.
Babylon 9... ... 滑稽的, 爱开玩笑的{  facetious } 有趣地; 好笑地{ amusingly } 有趣地; 使人愉快地{  entertainingly }.
ridiculously... ... ad. foolishly;ridiculously1.  愚蠢地，荒唐可笑地 laughably ad. amusingly,ridiculously1. 可笑地，有趣地.
amusing adj. 引起乐趣的； 娱人的amusingly adv. 娱人地feel/be amused at/by/with 对…感到有趣

list.abs: ～+副词trick amusingly 有趣地打扮trick deftly 熟练地打扮
the locals amusingly referred to this place as the wop-wops - a generic term for anywhere so remote , it doesn ’ t even warrant a name .当地人有趣地将其成为乡下，一种对任何偏远地区的通称。它甚至都没有一个名字。

entry.tran: 逗人笑的；有乐趣的；好笑的
entry.def: Someone or something that is amusing makes you laugh or smile.

example.ex: He had a terrific sense of humour and could be very amusing...
example.tran: 他极具幽默感，很会逗人发笑。

example.ex: They recounted amusing stories about their first sexual experiences.
example.tran: 他们讲述了他们第一次性经历的趣事。

means.word_mean: 1. in an entertaining and amusing manner;

sentences.sentence: "Hollywood has grown too sophisticated to turn out anything really amusingly bad these days"

auth_sentence.content: It's an amusingly polite heckle, yet no one really laughs.

auth_sentence.content: Her adulteress in "Flesh and the Devil" is amusingly selfish.
